text: Jetlag Dreams is an album by Departure Lounge released on September 11, 2001. An all-instrumental album, recorded in Nashville, Tennessee, it was the second to be released by the group, and their first to be issued on Bella Union Records. ==Track listing== #"Equestrian Skydiving" #"Runway Doubts" #"Too Late to Die Young" #"A Strange Descent" #"Purple Fluffy Haze" #"Charles de Gaulle to Belleville" #"Beyond the Beltway" Category:Departure Lounge (band) albums Category:2001 albums Category:Instrumental rock albums Category:Bella Union albums
title: Jetlag Dreams
